website_summaries.verdict: Creates an organic look and feel with real eucalyptus wood that adapts well to most backyard settings.
pros: Enhance your backyard with the appeal of a comfortable chair that won't overwhelm the natural environment
Sold as one, this chair is simply structured and maintains its stature even in rainy conditions
Is DIY-ready and can be painted in your preferred color
cons: While this chair is made of real wood, its look and feel may lend some to believe its not

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and strong
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't too sure about ordering a chair unseen but this chair is exactly what I was looking for. Wanted something that could handle damp/wet situations yet not so big as a yard chair. It is in bathroom, comfortable, strong and nice looking. Dimensions are accurate, very easy to put together. All predrilled holes line up, screws are tightened with allen wrench, provided. Might actually want more for our porch.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Tale of two chairs; one would get 5 stars the second 3.
customer_reviews.text: Chairs arrived same time, one was double boxed, the other single boxed. Opened and assembled single boxed first, everything fit perfectly. Double boxed chair pieces did not fit, pegs or tongues did not align, had to enlarge one groove on side to complete assembly. Once adjustments made stained borh chairs, recommend light sanding prior to staining. Over all chairs look good and feel solid. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and okay.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these for outdoor use. They aren't as heavy made as expected but are okay. We had to return one because it was missing parts but we received the replacement quickly and without hassle. Not sure how they will do in outdoor weather, but are pretty much what you pay for given the price. The finish color is nice.
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: you could get a lemon of a chair, i did.
customer_reviews.text: i like the low arms on this chair. but the parts did not fit together well, and my adult son had difficulty attaching the seat, also two of the screws stripped and did not screw all the way in. he ended up reinforcing the frame with additional holes and screws. not possible to return but i should have heeded the reviews that said this product had big faults.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wesling

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: very nice but not as wide and comfy as I hoped. They are a good replacement for my very old chairs. Not as much charm, it is obvious they are a newer model. I prefer the historical look that are made like they were in the good old days. But they are very nice, look great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... four pieces of VIFAH eucalyptus patio furniture and am pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I have four pieces of VIFAH eucalyptus patio furniture and am pleased with the quality, construction, and ease of assembly. I am tall, and long legged, and this chair is very comfortable for my frame. I recently had to clean this chair and the 2 seat bench after some rain last week, and just a brush and water worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: momma maria

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality chairs that match the table exactly. Very pleased. I do recommend using a cordless drill when assembling them. The included alan wrench is not sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: ckrider2

customer_reviews.title: cheap but functional
customer_reviews.text: They look cheap and the feel cheap. If I were a 250 pound man I probably wouldn't sit in this chair as I don't know if it would support that amount of weight other than that they're fine. These aren't handmade $250 teak chairs rather, their manufactured imports from Vietnam. You get what you pay for as per usual. It should be noted that these are not unfinished in fact they are stained in a redwood color.
customer_reviews.author: J. Defig

customer_reviews.title: Patio chairs
customer_reviews.text: Put the chairs together today. They were simple to get assemble. Takes less time with a drill. Quick and easy. The materials are excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Kay

customer_reviews.title: Nice outdoor chair
customer_reviews.text: simple to put together and a very nice chair. I am very happy with it. It seems to weather well so far in the fall season.
customer_reviews.author: Lorensd1

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of the chair
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the chair. But the other reviews are right about the frayed wooden finish. I received two splinters from handling the two chairs I purchased. Not to mention, out of the two I ordered, only one came with instructions and screws. So I had to go to the hardware store just to finish one. Overall, it's a quick assembly. But the wood does feel cheap. I don't anticipate it falling apart anytime soon, but I do anticipate it crumbling eventually from dealing with the blunt force of people sitting in it. The wood just feels thin and rickety.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine W

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 chairs; both missing front piece... will be contacting you for missing part... Joan Thorsen
customer_reviews.author: Joan Thorsen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and look nice, but not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Beth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are pleased with the chair. It is just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for an accent chair on my front porch.
customer_reviews.author: WWKRD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chairs and looks great near my pool. Thank you for the quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey1

customer_reviews.title: Needs a strong hand to put it together
customer_reviews.text: Wood is a little rough and the Allen wrench is hard to use to screw in the screws
customer_reviews.author: M. Rathfelder

customer_reviews.title: Would"nt order again!
customer_reviews.text: The chairs were rough and not sanded before they were stained. Very splintery and the stain was splotchy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, assembles fairly easily. A suggestion to manufacturer would be to include a modified Allen wrench that could be used in drill. Lots of turning with conventional Allen wrench is tiresome. Getting back to the chairs, they really are a nice piece of furniture and I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: 101 Jumpmaster

customer_reviews.title: Picture Enhances
customer_reviews.text: The chair arrived and is a beautiful wood color. It is sturdy, however, the picture shows the wood as thicker than it actually is. Arms are thin and very uncomfortable. I need to use arms to stand and the thinness of the wood makes it uncomfortable. Also seat is a bit low. Lower than normal chair height.
customer_reviews.author: GinaL

product_meta.title: Vifah V415 Outdoor Wood Arm Chair, Natural Wood Finish, 22 by 25 by 35-Inch
product_meta.description: Size:22-Inch by 25-Inch by 35-InchV415 -Frame Construction Material: Eucalyptus wood. -Finish: Natural Oiled rubbed (tan). -Fade Resistant: Yes.
feature_bullets: Pre-treated, expertly kiln-dried, extremely durable FSC Eucalyptus
Mold, mildew, fungi, termites, rot and decay resistant
Visual appeal as well as comfprt
Outdoor furniture great for the patio, deck, poolside, backyard and garden
